nodes.text: In 1 ABY, Trandoshan slavers of the Blackscale Clan had set up a hunting camp on a high-rising rock formation on the Webweaver Path level of the Rryatt Trail on the planet Kashyyyk. It consisted of several primitive huts and was guarded by well-armed Trandoshans of the Blackscale Clan.
The Trandoshans used long range communication units to communicate with their clan through the dense forests.
